message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You're being too generous, I'll take the majority!
I'll take the majority this time, you can't outbid me!
You're getting greedy, I'll give you a little less than the majority!
I'll compromise, but not too much, I still want the majority!
I'm not backing down, meet me in the middle!
I'll meet you in the middle, but just barely!
